title: Update not received yet
content: Before one week I had updated my phone from Android 10 to 11 beta.but I was facing so many issues so I request to Google support to give me my regular version Android 10.in reply of these they told me that you fast do the factory reset and then after on Google beta program you opt out then after within 24 to 48 hours we will send you Android 10 regular update but till today even after completion of 48 hours I have not received this update. I want my regular version Android 10 at the earliest what to do please reply
